content.rendered:
Directed by Clay Kaytis

Written by Nick Schenk. Clay Kaytis. Nick Schenk

Star Peter Billingsley(Ralphie Parker). Zack Ward(Officer Scut Farkus). Erinn Hayes(Sandy Parker). Scott Schwartz(Flick). Ian Petrella(Randy). R.D. Robb(Schwartz). Mark Arnold(Neighbor Joe). J.R. Esposito(Elf). River Drosche(Mark). Julianna Layne(Julie). Mariana Stansheva(Mrs. Wisniewski). Lauren Mora(Elf 2). Joseph Al Ahmad(Narrator). Nicholas Colicos(Black Bart). Sam Parks(Tall Man). Chris Jarman(Big Guard). David Gillespie(Santa). Derek Morse(Ike). Henry Miller(Local Larry). Owen Davis(Chicago Caroler). Davis Murphy(Delbert Bumpus). Tegan Grace Muggeridge(Teenage Julie). Nathan Cooper(Irish Tree Lot Guy #2). Benjamin Noble(Terrance). Ian Porter(Editor). Anton Poriazov(Stunt Lamp Post Guy 1). Billy Brayshaw(Teenage Mark). Lyubomir Neikov(Large Man). Michael Flemming(Caroler William). Alistair Galloway(Bully 2). Julie Yammanee(Caroler Linda). Norman Murray(Irish Tree lot Guy 1). Nicole Gulimanova(Elf #3).Sava Tomov. Krassimir Manov(Bar Mitch). Cailean Galloway(Bully 1). Rosa O’Reilly(Caroler Olivia). Marina Terziyska(Bar Fly Raspy)

Language English

Producers Peter Billingsley. Mike Drake. Nick Schenk. Iliya Sotirov. Vince Vaughn

Production Legendary Entertainment. Rotten . Eggs Productions. Warner Bros
